issue.title: [CF 572] mouseover role condition doesn't work and causes fps drop
issue.body:
TMW v.6.0.2

Export string
^1^T^SType^Sconditionicon ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SROLE ^SUnit^Smouseover ^SLevel^N1 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N60101^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

A condition checking mouseover role does not work (never returns true) and causes my fps to drop (from 60 to 15).
Disabled all other addons. But wtf folder was not deleted.
This happens both in groups (with and without roles set) and when soloing with no role set.
This seems to only happen when checking mouseover. I haven't tried all units (only target, player, raid1-40 which all worked).
This seems to only happen when checking role. I haven't tried all conditions (only buff, class, unit exists which all worked).

I hope this was helpful. Thanks for a great addon :)

Edit: Didn't realise the pre-entered text was a template. Sorry about that.
To reproduce: Import string from above. Type /tmw to exit config mode.
Expectations: 60 fps. I expect the icon to return true.
What happened instead: 15 fps. Icon always returns false.


> Posted by CurseForge user trixter21992251 | Imported from CurseForge issue #572 | Raw

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting this. In the future, though, before you submit a bug report for an addon (TellMeWhen or otherwise), enable Lua errors. Addon authors will fall in love with you.

Fixed in r569


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
